name: auth0-swift-data-app
description: This is the seed project you need to use if you're going to create a NodeJS API. You'll mostly use this API either for a SPA or a Mobile app. If you just want to create a Regular NodeJS WebApp, please check [this other seed project](https://github.com/auth0/node-auth0/tree/master/examples/nodejs-regular-webapp)
author: Eli Harkins
